text: Let's start with deployment and onboarding.
We begin by registering the employee data.
Companies simply share their employee list, and our team uploads and validates every record to make sure the system is ready.
Next, every worker is automatically assigned a unique FOS ID.
We send these IDs directly to employees through our SMS service, completely free of cost, so everyone gets immediate access, even without a smartphone.
To boost awareness on the factory floor, we create personalized FOS awareness cards for every employee.
These cards include their IDs, reporting channels, and quick instructions to help everyone understand how to launch a complaint easily.
During onboarding, factories also appoint investigation officers.
These officers are responsible for resolving and documenting cases.
Depending on the size of the facility, there can be multiple investigation officers for
different units, genders, or complaint categories.
Each investigation officer receives secure access to the I/O portal, where they document root cause analysis, corrective and preventive actions, and upload evidence.

To ensure a smooth rollout, our FOS team visits your facility and conducts complete on-site sessions, training workers on how to report concerns, briefing management on dashboards and responsibilities, and walking everyone through the entire system.
Finally, our investigation officer training equips them with the skills they need, how to validate complaints,
build corrective action plans, upload evidence, and close cases effectively.
This ensures your grievance management system is fully functional from day one.
